get.summary: Get list of members from api
get.description: Returns a list of all members in the API to the requesting user

201.description: Return code 201 to user if creation of new member was successful.

400.description: Return status 400 to the user, if one or multiple parameters are missing.

post.description: Add new member into the array.

200.description: Returns details of Member to the user

400.description: Return status code 400 to the user if invalid ID was entered.

value.error: Member was not found in database.

404.description: Return error 404 to the user if member with this ID is not found.

get.summary: Get full details for a member
get.description: Returns full details of a given id member

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This is id of member the user has requested.

201.description: The member to be updated is not found in the array

400.description: Return status code 400 to the user if invalid ID was entered.

value.error: Id was not found in member array.

404.description: Return error 404 to the user if member with this ID is not found.

put.summary: Update full details for a member

204.description: Returned error, in case deletion was successful.

400.description: Returned error, in case deletion was bad request.

value.error: Member\w+ was not found in member array.

404.description: Returned error, in case deletion was not found.

delete.summary: Delete full details for a member

404.description: No return a list of coaches

get.description: Returns a list of events from the api

value.Name: Night Vision Challenge
value.Description: Test your stealth and awareness in low-light conditions in this thrilling night-time event.

value.Name: Silent Blade Workshop
value.Description: Hone your skills with the blade and master the silent takedown in this exclusive workshop.

201.description: Return code 201 to user if creation of new event was successful.

post.description: Add a new event into the array.

/events/{eventId}.summary: Path used to manage a single event.
/events/{eventId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `event`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `event`.

/eventattendees.summary: Path used to manage the list of eventattendees.
/eventattendees.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `eventattendees` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `eventattendees` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `eventattendees` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `eventattendees`.

/eventattendees/{eventattendeesId}.summary: Path used to manage a single eventattendees.
/eventattendees/{eventattendeesId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `eventattendees`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `eventattendees`.

event.title: Root Type for event
event.example:
{
    "EventID": '1',
    "CoachID": '6',
    "Name": "Shadow Tactics Training",
    "Date": "2025-02-10",
    "Location": "Hidden Dojo, Mountain Pass",
    "Description": "Master the art of stealth, agility, and precision in this advanced ninja training session."
}
